Package main

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
main.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment extends Object
This class represents the game environment for managing a team, reserves, items, and game progress.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameEnvironment(String name, int duration)
    Constructs a GameEnvironment object with the specified team name and duration.

      public void useItem(int itemID, int athleteType, int athleteID)
      Uses the specified item on the athlete with the given athleteType and athleteID.
      Parameters:
      itemID - the ID of the item to use
      athleteType - the type of the athlete (1 for team member, 2 for reserve)
      athleteID - the ID of the athlete to use the item on
